mainSequence.step: Customer inserts card into the ATM
ATM verifies PIN with Bank System
ATM displays PIN verification result to Customer
Customer selects Balance Inquiry or Withdrawal
ATM requests Balance data from Bank System
Bank System provides Balance data to ATM
ATM requests Withdrawal from Bank System
Bank System validates funds for Withdrawal
ATM processes Withdrawal if funds are sufficient
ATM processes Withdrawal if funds are insufficient
ATM displays Insufficient Funds message to Customer
ATM prompts Customer to remove card
